original_text: When he came to Jerusalem, he tried to join the disciples, but they were all afraid of him, not believing that he really was a disciple.
korean_text: 사울이 예루살렘에 가서 제자들을 사귀고자 하나 다 두려워하여 그가 제자 됨을 믿지 아니하니

sentences.original_text: he tried to join the disciples
but they were all afraid of him
not believing that he really was a disciple
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 정말 제자인 것을 믿지 않았습니다
